item.title: C/C++ Package Manager - Mon Nov 03 09:41:59 UTC 2025
item.description:
Provides integration with the vcpkg package manager: UI for working with vcpkg packages, quick-fixes for adding the missing packages automatically.
vendor: JetBrains s.r.o. downloads: 0 pricingModel: FREE xmlId: com.jetbrains.clion.plugins.packageManager
